actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 213(a) of the War Claims Act of 1948 to provide for the full payment of certain individual claims under that act.

summary.text: Removes the $35,000 limit on awards made to specified individuals and corporations under the War Claims Act of 1948. (Amends 50 App. U.S.C. 2017l(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 213(a) of the War Claims Act of 1948 to provide for the full payment of certain individual claims under that act.
